document_data.name: Mass Dominate
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mass dominate''''' was a more powerful version of the ''[[dominate monster]]'' [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s, [[sorcerer]]s, [[bard]]s, and the [[Dreadmaster]]s of [[Bane]].
document_data.Effects: When the spell was cast, it affected all creatures within an area the caster could see of {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} in radius. All creatures who failed to retain their will were dominated by the caster. The domination lasted for fifty-four seconds and even longer if cast by a person of epic powers. [[Undead]] creatures were unaffected by the spell.
